{"id":971654231,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 6 days","timestamp":1686809428,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/971654231/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"40.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        if( dividend == -2147483648 && divisor == -1) return 2147483647;\n        boolean isNegative = false;\n        if((dividend < 0 && divisor > 0) || (dividend > 0 && divisor < 0) ) isNegative = true;\n        long a = dividend;\n        long b = divisor;\n        if(a<0) a = -a;\n        if(b<0) b = -b;\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 31; i>=0; i--){\n            if(a >= (b<<i)){\n                a = a - (b<<i);\n                ans += (1<<i);\n                if(a<b){\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        if(isNegative) ans = -ans;\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false}
